properties.title: NH-Collection-Barcelona-Gran-Hotel-Calderon
properties.description: Property The elegant NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón has an excellent location just off Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in central Barcelona.

properties.title: Sensation Sagrada Familia
properties.description: Within a 2-minute walk of Gaudí’s Sagrada Família, these bright modern apartments feature a shared rooftop terrace and a small outdoor swimming pool with views of the city’s famous Basilica.

properties.title: Midtown Luxury Apartments by Sweet Inn
properties.description: These bright and spacious Midtown Luxury Apartments by Sweet Inn are located in a renovated building, 6 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard.

properties.title: Lugaris Beach
properties.description: Lugaris Beach is located less than 656 feet from Bogatell Beach in the quiet neighborhood of Poble Nou.

properties.title: Masia Cal Lari
properties.description: Offering barbecue facilities and mountain view, Masia Cal Lari is located in Barcelona, 21 miles from Tibidabo and 22 miles from Camp Nou.

properties.title: Masía Can Tramontana
properties.description: Located in Tiana, 1.2 miles from Platja de les Moreres and 1.2 miles from Montgat Beach, Masía Can Tramontana provides accommodations with free WiFi, air conditioning and a garden.

properties.title: Nits de Bosc Opens in new window Nits de Bosc
properties.description: Nits de Bosc has a restaurant, seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a bar and shared lounge in Vilassar de Dalt. The property features a garden, as well as a terrace.

properties.title: Villa Victoria Barcelona
properties.description: Featuring a private outdoor pool, extensive gardens and a hot tub, Villa Victoria Barcelona is a 10-minute walk from Güell Park.

properties.title: Fridays Flats Casa Flor, Villa with Pool
properties.description: Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Fridays Flats Casa Flor, Villa with Pool has a balcony.
